trans-unit.source: Provides properties through which a control that displays hierarchical data communicates with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
Controls that display a header and child items use this interface to provide information to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel>.
Gets or sets an object that represents the sizes of the control's viewport and cache.
An object that represents the sizes of the control's viewport and cache.
Gets an object that represents the desired size of the control's header, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] and in logical units.
An object that represents the desired size of the control's header, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] and in logical units.
Gets a value that indicates whether the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority.
Virtualizing panels can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo.InBackgroundLayout%2A> property to populate the caches of the control.
By performing a layout pass at a lower priority to populate the caches, an application does not become unresponsive.
`true` if the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets an object that represents the desired size of the control's items, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] and in logical units.
An object that represents the desired size of the control's items, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] and in logical units.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> that displays the items of the control.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> that displays the items of the control.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owning <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> should virtualize its items.
`true` if the owning <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> should virtualize its items; otherwise, `false`.
